data.message: can you let people there know that we would like to see everything our friends and family and liked pages post in order it was posted... all the posts ... not just the ones you chose to deem important ... however that works.   That's the one HUGE pet peeve I have with Facebook

replies.message: crap .... realized I didn't get to see this until 19 hours after it was posted because it was random on my "pages" feed instead of my regular feed..... see why it irks me.
